name: KiKi's House
description:
KiKi's House is a horizontal 2D puzzle game with a rich emphasis on storytelling. 

In a vast medieval setting, the heroine Vivian underwent a thrilling experience in a witch's house. Seeing mysterious signs of her past, a more unsettling history was unfolding under her own eyes...

Control: Use 'E' to interact. You can also left-click items.

EDIT: there is a known typo in the script, "staires" should really just be "stairs."
